## Description of the data

First, we will summarize the clinical data

```{r}
clinical_data_augment|>
  summarize()
```

Count of smokers vs non smokers

Smoker groups

```{r}
clinical_data_augment |>
  ggplot(
    mapping=aes(x=smoker_groups, fill= smoker_groups)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(
    x = "Smoker groups",
    y = "Count of samples",
    title = "Samples per smoker group"
  )
  

```

```{r}
clinical_data_augment |>
  ggplot(
    mapping=aes(x=gender.demographic, fill= gender.demographic)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(
    x = "Gender",
    y = "Count of samples",
    title = "Samples per gender"
  )
```

```{r}
clinical_data_augment |>
  ggplot(
    mapping=aes(x=ajcc_pathologic_stage.diagnoses, fill= ajcc_pathologic_stage.diagnoses)) +
  geom_bar() +
  labs(
    x = "Cancer stage",
    y = "Count of samples",
    title = "Samples per cancer stage"
  )
```

```{r}
clinical_data_augment |>
  ggplot(
    mapping=aes(x=age_at_index.demographic, fill= age_at_index.demographic)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  labs(
    x = "Age",
    y = "Count of samples",
    title = "Distribution of ages"
  )
```

```{r}
clinical_data_augment |>
  ggplot(
    mapping=aes(x=ajcc_pathologic_stage.diagnoses, y=age_at_index.demographic, fill= ajcc_pathologic_stage.diagnoses)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    x = "Cancer stage",
    y = "Age",
    title = "Age distribution by cancer stage"
  )
```

Vital status vs age at diagnosis (correlation)

```{r}
clinical_data_augment |>
  ggplot(
    mapping=aes(x=vital_status.demographic, y=age_at_diagnosis.diagnoses, fill= vital_status.demographic)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    x = "Vital status",
    y = "Age at diagnosis",
    title = "..."
  )
```
